properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Baffin Bay to Port Mansfield TX out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Port Mansfield TX to the Rio Grande River out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 2 at 10:04PM CST until February 4 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Brownsville TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas
4 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Baffin Bay to the Rio Grande out 20
nm.

* WHEN...From noon Monday to 6 AM CST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON MONDAY TO 6 AM CST TUESDAY
